mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 88 shows harvested rice bundle stacks drying in a field. Tree line, road, and telephone lines shown in the distance.
mods.note: Compare photograph to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, pp. 371-436.
